1: I trust fully and find refuge in loving protection.
2: I call on the Highest; my efforts succeed.
3: Mercy and truth arrive, providing protection and honor.
4: Peace prevails; gentle words make every gathering safe.
5: Transcendent glory shines above the skies and uplifts the earth.
6: Traps backfire; the upright walk safely.
7: I stay steadfast and sing joyful praise.
8: I awaken early, stirring my talents to joyful music.
9: I sing praise openly among all people and nations.
10: Mercy reaches the heavens and truth fills the skies.
11: Honor the highest good above heaven and earth.
